Episodes.Title: The Damned Thing
Episodes.Plot: The Damned Thing is the apocalyptic tale of a mysterious creature that terrorizes a small Texas town.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Contains horror, graphic violence and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Sean Patrick Flanery, Marisa Coughlan, Ted Raimi, Ted Friend, Ocean Hellman, Eileen Barrett, Tracy Waterhouse, Brendan Fletcher, Ryan Drescher, Brent Stait, Georgia Craig, Alex Ferris

Episodes.Title: Family
Episodes.Plot: A young couple moves into a new home only to find out that their neighbor, a seemingly normal man who works from home is not what he seems.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Graphic violence, sexual references and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Meredith Monroe, Matt Keeslar, George Wendt, John Scott, Nancy Whyte, Haley Guiel

Episodes.Title: The V Word
Episodes.Plot: A lone vampire punishes two teenage boys who make the poor decision to break into a mortuary.
Episodes.GuestStars: Michael Ironside, Arjay Smith, Branden Nadon, Lynda Boyd, Jodelle Ferland, Keith Humphrey

Episodes.Title: Sounds Like
Episodes.Plot: Based on a short story by Mike O?Driscoll. The story of Larry Pearce, an ordinary man blessed with gift/curse of extraordinary hearing that drives him to the brink of insanity, and forces him to take violent action to silence the horrific cacophony in his head.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Contains sex scenes, offensive language and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Chris Bauer, Laura Margolis, Nicholas Elia, Richard Kahan, Michael Daingerfield, David Allan Pearson, David Lovgren

Episodes.Title: Pro-Life
Episodes.Plot: Pro-Life tells the story of a young girl trapped inside a clinic who discovers the only thing more dangerous than her pursuers is the demonic secret that she carries within her.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence, offensive language and horror
Episodes.GuestStars: Caitlin Wachs, Ron Perlman, Emmanuelle Vaugier, Mark Feuerstein, Biski Gugushe, Jeremy Jones, Lisa Bunting, Stephen Dimopoulos, Ashley Williams, Grace Bauer, Bill Dow, Arabella Bushnell, Graeme McComb, Benjamin R

Episodes.Title: Pelts
Episodes.Plot: Pelts is an erotic tale about stolen raccoon pelts that take violent revenge on those who seek to wear them.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence, horror, sex scenes and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Meat Loaf, John Saxon, Ellen Ewusie, Link Baker, Brenda McDonald, Michal Suchanek, Emilio Salituro, Elise Lew

Episodes.Title: The Screwfly Solution
Episodes.Plot: Deadly virus infects the nation, that turns men into psychotic killers who attack every woman they see. A housewife and her daughter try to survive this madness.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Graphic violence, sex scenes and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Jason Priestley, Elliott Gould, Brenna O'Brien, Kerry Norton, Linda Darlow, William Taylor, Nelson Carter Leis

Episodes.Title: Valerie on the Stairs
Episodes.Plot: Rob Hanisee is a writer that has a strange apparition. Beautiful, naked and mysterious, Valerie might be the muse that Rob has always searched for - or the manifestation of a much darker force. Blood and death follow Rob across the line between life and art.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Sex scenes, violence, drug use and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Tyron Leitso, Nicola Lipman, Jonathan Watton, Christopher Lloyd, Christine Barrie, Clare Grant, Suki Kaiser

Episodes.Title: Right to Die
Episodes.Plot: Her flesh has been burned and her body remains in coma but from a medical perspective, Abby is still alive. Her husband Cliff is determined to get a court order to stop her pain. But Abby's condition is worsening, she repeatedly flat-lines and is revived. Each time her body dies, her spirit grows stronger attacking those that have taken advantage of her plight.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence, offensive language, sex scenes and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Julia Benson, Martin Donovan, Anna Galvin, Corbin Bernsen, Robin Sydney, Linda Sorenson, Derek Green

Episodes.Title: We All Scream for Ice Cream
Episodes.Plot: A long time ago, a prank by a gang of kids known as the West End Bunch went wrong. Now grown up and a parent himself, former West-Ender Layne Banixter witnesses the friends of his youth murdered by their own children, who have turned against them. To save his own family Layne must face his fears and realize that sometimes the sins of the fathers are visited upon the son.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Contains violence, horror scenes and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Brent Sheppard, Maxwell Neck, Tim Henry, Lee Tergesen, Laura Drummond, Ingrid Tesch, Colin Cunningham, Quinn Lord, William Forsythe

Episodes.Title: The Black Cat
Episodes.Plot: Edgar Allan Poe is a writer out of ideas and short on cash that's followed by a black cat that will destroy his life or help him to write one of his most famous stories.
Episodes.GuestStars: Jeffrey Combs, Christopher Heyerdahl, Elyse Levesque, Aron Tager, Eric Keenleyside, Ken Kramer

Episodes.Title: The Washingtonians
Episodes.Plot: After his grandmother's funeral, Mike finds out an artifact in her basement could re-write the history of our nation. There are clues that suggest George Washington was in fact a cannibal, Mike must protect his family and escape from a band of Washingtonians, hungry for human flesh and willing to protect Washington's secrets.
Episodes.GuestStars: Johnathon Schaech, Venus Terzo, Abraham Jedidiah, Esme Lambert, Myron Natwick, Julia Tortolano, Saul Rubinek

Episodes.Title: Dream Cruise
Episodes.Plot: Jack, an American lawyer working in Tokyo, has fallen in love with the wife of his most valued client, Eiji. Despite Jack's deep-rooted fear of the sea, he reluctantly accepts Eiji's invitation to join the couple for a day trip on the Tokyo Bay. Pleasure turns to terror as they discover the watery destiny in store for each of them.
Episodes.GuestStars: Ethan Amis, Daniel Gillies, Yoshino Kimura, Ryo Ishibashi, Miho Ninagawa
